explains: adj. 首要的；支配一切的；包罗万象的
v. 成拱形（overarch 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: The overarching question seems to be what happens when the U.S. pulls out?
sentences.cn: 中心的问题看来是当美国撤出时会发生什么？

sentences.en: Now logistics costs are an overarching priority.
sentences.cn: 现在，物流成本是首要考虑的因素。

sentences.en: Enterprise governance is the overarching perspective.
sentences.cn: 企业治理最完整的视角。
